trans-unit.source: Column names without a table prefix (like ‘post_date’) are checked against a list of allowed and known tables, and then, if found, have a table prefix (such as ‘wp_posts.’) prepended. Prefixed column names (such as ‘wp_posts.post_date’) bypass this allowed check, and are only sanitized to remove illegal characters.
trans-unit.target: Column names without a table prefix (like ‘post_date’) are checked against a list of allowed and known tables, and then, if found, have a table prefix (such as ‘wp_posts.’) prepended. Prefixed column names (such as ‘wp_posts.post_date’) bypass this allowed check, and are only sanitized to remove illegal characters.

trans-unit.source: Column names without a table prefix (like ‘post_date’) are checked against a whitelist of known tables, and then, if found, have a table prefix (such as ‘wp_posts.’) prepended. Prefixed column names (such as ‘wp_posts.post_date’) bypass this whitelist check, and are only sanitized to remove illegal characters.
trans-unit.target: 테이블 접두어가없는 열 이름 (예 : 'post_date')은 알려진 테이블의 화이트리스트와 비교하여 확인한 후 발견되면 테이블 접두어 (예 : 'wp_posts.')가 앞에 붙습니다. 접두사로 지정된 열 이름 (예 : 'wp_posts.post_date')은이 화이트리스트 확인을 무시하고 잘못된 문자를 제거하기 위해 위생 처리됩니다.

trans-unit.target: Combined with the manage_pages_columns filter, this allows you to add or remove (unset) custom columns to the list page pages. Note that if you are using custom post types and it has ‘ hierarchical ‘ => true , then you will need to use this action hook and not manage_$post_type_posts_custom_column.

trans-unit.source: Combined with the manage_{$post_type}_posts_columns filter, this allows you to add or remove (unset) custom columns to the list post/page/custom post type pages (which automatically appear in Screen Options). The action described in here works both for built in post types as well as custom post types. manage_{$post->$post_type}_posts_custom_column can be used in WP 3.1 and later for specific custom post types. Note that if the custom post type has 'hierarchical' => true, then the correct action hook to use is manage_pages_custom_column.

trans-unit.source: Core feature(s) the post type supports. Serves as an alias for calling add_post_type_support() directly. Core features include 'title', 'editor', 'comments', 'revisions', 'trackbacks', 'author', 'excerpt', 'page-attributes', 'thumbnail', 'custom-fields', and 'post-formats'. Additionally, the 'revisions' feature dictates whether the post type will store revisions, and the 'comments' feature dictates whether the comments count will show on the edit screen. A feature can also be specified as an array of arguments to provide additional information about supporting that feature. Example: array( 'my_feature', array( 'field' => 'value' ) ). Default is an array containing 'title' and 'editor'.
trans-unit.target: Core feature(s) the post type supports. Serves as an alias for calling add_post_type_support() directly. Core features include 'title', 'editor', 'comments', 'revisions', 'trackbacks', 'author', 'excerpt', 'page-attributes', 'thumbnail', 'custom-fields', and 'post-formats'. Additionally, the 'revisions' feature dictates whether the post type will store revisions, and the 'comments' feature dictates whether the comments count will show on the edit screen. A feature can also be specified as an array of arguments to provide additional information about supporting that feature. Example: array( 'my_feature', array( 'field' => 'value' ) ) . Default is an array containing 'title' and 'editor'.

trans-unit.source: Core feature(s) the post type supports. Serves as an alias for calling add_post_type_support() directly. Core features include 'title', 'editor', 'comments', 'revisions', 'trackbacks', 'author', 'excerpt', 'page-attributes', 'thumbnail', 'custom-fields', and 'post-formats'. Additionally, the 'revisions' feature dictates whether the post type will store revisions, and the 'comments' feature dictates whether the comments count will show on the edit screen. Defaults is an array containing 'title' and 'editor'.
trans-unit.target: 게시물 유형이 지원하는 핵심 기능입니다. add_post_type_support ()를 직접 호출하기위한 별명으로 사용 됩니다. 핵심 기능에는 '제목', '편집기', '댓글', '개정판', '트랙백', '저자', '발췌', '페이지 속성', '썸네일', '맞춤 필드'및 '게시물'이 있습니다. -포맷 '. 또한 '개정판'기능은 게시물 유형에 수정본을 저장할지 여부를 결정하고 '설명'기능은 댓글 수를 편집 화면에 표시할지 여부를 결정합니다. 기본값은 'title'과 'editor'를 포함하는 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash of a plain text password. Unless the global $wp_hasher is set, the default implementation uses PasswordHash, which adds salt to the password and hashes it with 2**8 = 256 passes of MD5. MD5 is used by default because it’s supported on all platforms. You can configure PasswordHash to use Blowfish or extended DES (if available) instead of MD5 with the $portable_hashes constructor argument or property (see examples).
trans-unit.target: Creates a hash of a plain text password. Unless the global $wp_hasher is set, the default implementation uses PasswordHash , which adds salt to the password and hashes it with 2**8 = 256 passes of MD5. MD5 is used by default because it’s supported on all platforms. You can configure PasswordHash to use Blowfish or extended DES (if available) instead of MD5 with the $portable_hashes constructor argument or property (see examples).

trans-unit.source: Debugging includes several actions, which pass different variables for debugging the HTTP API.
trans-unit.target: 디버깅에는 HTTP API 디버깅을 위해 다른 변수를 전달하는 몇 가지 작업이 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Debugging is also frequently left enabled after looking for errors on a site, as site owners do not understand the implications of this.
trans-unit.target: 사이트 소유자는이 문제의 의미를 이해하지 못하기 때문에 사이트에서 오류를 찾은 후에도 디버깅을 자주 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Decision is based on RFC 2109/2965, so look there for details on validity.
trans-unit.target: 결정은 RFC 2109/2965를 기반으로하므로 유효성에 대한 자세한 내용을 확인하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Decoded a chunked body as per RFC 2616

trans-unit.source: Decodes chunk transfer-encoding, based off the HTTP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 1.1 사양에 따라 청크 전송 인코딩을 디코딩합니다.

trans-unit.source: Decodes handles and arguments, then dequeues handles and removes arguments from the class property $args.
trans-unit.target: 핸들과 인수를 디코딩 한 다음 핸들을 제거하고 클래스 속성 $ args에서 인수를 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: Decodes handles and arguments, then queues handles and stores arguments in the class property $args. For example in extending classes, $args is appended to the item url as a query string. Note $args is NOT the $args property of items in the $registered array.
trans-unit.target: 핸들과 인수를 디코딩 한 다음, 대기열을 처리하고 클래스 속성 $ args에 인수를 저장합니다. 예를 들어 클래스를 확장 할 때 $ args가 항목 url에 쿼리 문자열로 추가됩니다. 참고 $ args는 $ registered 배열에있는 항목의 $ args 속성이 아닙니다.
